      • escapeJavaScript

        @NotNull
java.lang.String escapeJavaScript(@Nullable
                                           java.lang.String text)
        Escapes code (javascript) inside <script> tags. As builder builds HTML (not XHTML), it prevents only '</script>'.
        Returns:
        escaped text
